title: Where is the counterplay to Vi's ultimate?
body: I'm sure all the Vi mains will come in here and swear up and down it's fine in its current state but there is no fucking thing you can do about it if she uses her immense skill to hover the mouse over you and press r. Every other suppression ultimate can be cleansed but the longest range one isn't? This is completely unfair. The main retort people will have is "position better" but when someone has 1400 range in fucking dashes what is even the point of leaving fountain? And it is not always yourself you have to worry about, it is also your teammates.

replies.body: I hate Vi, but the way to deal with the counterplay is after she her ult: shut her off from her team and peel for whoever she ulted onto. She relies heavily on follow up, if she doesn't get that follow up, she's screwed.

trinity force on tanky vi lets her close the gap between her target and add hundreds of damage onto her auto attacks with her E, so it's harder for the carry to get away unless they have a slow or are jinx.  Sivir can spell shield, but she doesn't do well against fighters

> Quicksilver Sash should counter it like every other Suppression.

It's not a suppression.  You probably shouldn't be complaining about a champion if you don't even know their kit.

Vi's ult is not a suppression.  It's a knockup stun, so it's not reducable by Tenacity and cannot be cleansed.

The counterplay to Vi's ult is that she is forced to dive you to use it.  She also can't stop if it turns out diving you was a very bad idea.  She's immune to CC, but not damage.  And if you're near a tower, flashing under it is likely to kill her.

If you let yourself get poked down to the point where she can one-shot you with it, that's your fault.  There are plenty of champs who can delete a half-health ADC with one ability rotation (if not one ability), and most of them don't have to put themselves at the same kind of risk or have much better escapes.
It's not *supposed* to be easily countered. Why else do you think they added "Vi can't be CC'd during Assault & Battery"?

But how can Riot justify most nerfs with counterplay,toxic or whatever other fucking buzzword they use but this abomination of a champ still exists? No other ability fucks you up more if you have even the slightest mispositioning.
Flash under your tower or deep into your team or zhonyas.  Counterplay.  Vi can't stop her ult, she goes where you go.

There isn't counterplay to any particular champion ability.

There is counterplay to a champion. 

Once Vi presses R, she has committed to the fight. If you are behind your team, move to one side. If you are too far away, try to get closer. Once she is in, your team can CC and burst her. Have your support or tank peel the rest of the team - Vi goes in alone. 

You can't get out of her ultimate. You can play around it. That is the counterplay.
